table.name: vtiger_support
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_support` ( `supportid` int(11) NOT NULL, `supportno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `support_tks_name` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`supportid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_supportcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_supportcf` ( `supportid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`supportid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
